sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.
Speak to Alicia about any strange sightings.
Return to the Gate Guard with your findings.

outbreak.name: 1. Outbreak
outbreak.summary: Escape your apartment and reach the streets.
outbreak.description: The city is in chaos. You need to leave your building immediately.

sanctuary.name: 2. Sanctuary?
sanctuary.summary: Make your way to the R.P.D. station.
sanctuary.description: Brad Vickers radioed you. The Police Station is the designated shelter.

lockdown.name: 3. Lockdown
lockdown.summary: The station is locked down. Find the Spade Key.
lockdown.description: Lieutenant Marvin Branagh is injured. He told you to find a way out. The Spade Key opens the west wing.
objectives: Find the Spade Key in the West Wing office.

lost_officer.name: 4. Lost Officer
lost_officer.summary: Find Officer Elliot in the East Wing.
lost_officer.description: Elliot went to the East Wing to secure a way out. He hasn't returned.

medallions.name: 5. Medallions
medallions.summary: Collect the three medallions to open the secret passage.
medallions.description: The Goddess Statue in the Main Hall requires three medallions: Lion, Unicorn, and Maiden.

underground.name: 6. Underground
underground.summary: Descend into the secret underground facility.
underground.description: The statue has moved. The path below is open.

g_virus_confrontation.name: 7. G-Virus
g_virus_confrontation.summary: Survive the encounter with the mutant.
g_virus_confrontation.description: A monstrous creature is blocking the path. It seems to be mutating.

sewer_navigation.name: 8. Sewer Navigation
sewer_navigation.summary: Navigate the sewers to find the NEST entrance.
sewer_navigation.description: Ada Wong claims she can get you out, but you need to follow her through the sewers.
objectives: Find the Sewer Control Room Key.

alligator.name: 9. Alligator
alligator.description: Something huge is moving in the water.

cable_car.name: 10. Cable Car
cable_car.summary: Power up the cable car to reach the lab.
cable_car.description: The cable car is offline. You need to find the high-voltage plugs.

the_lab.name: 11. The Lab
the_lab.description: You have arrived at the source of the outbreak. Proceed with caution.
objectives: Find a map of the facility.

security_clearance.name: 12. Security Clearance
security_clearance.summary: Upgrade your ID wristband to Level 3.
security_clearance.description: Access to the West Area is restricted to Senior Staff.
objectives: Upgrade it to Level 2 in the Cafeteria.
Upgrade it to Level 3 in the Greenhouse.

antivirus.name: 13. Antivirus
antivirus.description: Sherry is infected. You must synthesize a vaccine in the P-4 Lab.

self_destruct.name: 14. Self Destruct
self_destruct.summary: Escape the facility before it explodes.
self_destruct.description: The self-destruct sequence has been initiated. You have 10 minutes.

nemesis_final.name: 15. Nemesis
nemesis_final.summary: Defeat Nemesis once and for all.
nemesis_final.description: He won't stop until you are dead. End this.
